TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementQualifierAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementQualifierAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagementQualifierAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: ManagementQualifier 屬性包含與 WMI 類別、執行個體、屬性、欄位或方法相關聯的其他 WMI 提供者相關資訊。

span.span: The ManagementQualifier attribute contains additional WMI provider-related information about an associated WMI class, instance, property, field or method.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 程式庫目前被視為最終狀態，針對影響這些程式庫的非安全性相關問題，不會提供進一步的開發、增強功能或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: [MI API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) 應使用於所有新的開發。

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 限定詞是由 WMI 基礎結構的名稱/值組。Qualifiers are name/value pairs used by the WMI infrastructure. WMI.NET 提供者擴充基礎結構，會自動產生大部分的所需的 WMI 限定詞。Most of the necessary WMI qualifiers are automatically generated by the WMI.NET Provider Extensions infrastructure. 許多其他屬性會導致產生 WMI 限定詞。Many of the other attributes cause the generation of WMI qualifiers. 不過，這個屬性可讓您以手動方式將額外的限定詞必須這麼做。However, this attribute lets you manually associate additional qualifiers should you need to do so. 若要深入了解本主題，請參閱[WMI 限定詞](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100924)MSDN online 上的 WMI SDK 中。To learn more about this topic, see [WMI Qualifiers](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=100924) in the WMI SDK on MSDN online. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 ManagementQualifier 屬性指出類別會實作 WMI 關聯類別。The following example demonstrates using the ManagementQualifier attribute to indicate that a class implements a WMI association class. 在此情況下，辨識符號都有指定限定詞的效果不能覆寫子類別中的類別。In this case, the qualifier has a flavor that specifies that the effect of the qualifier cannot be overridden in subclasses. ``` [ManagementQualifier("Association", Flavor = ManagementQualifierFlavors.DisableOverride)] public class AssociationSample { } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未指定值，則會預設為布林值 true。If you do not specify a value, it defaults to the boolean value true.
